name: IDIOTIC The Tech Demo
description:
Jump around, teleport between dimensions and shoot stuff in procedurally generated scene with no sound 'cause I don't have the brain juice for that! 

Subreddit r/IdioticTheGame:

https://www.reddit.com/r/IdioticTheGame?utm_medium=android_app&utm_source=share

A tech demo with no sound and quite little content. I made the skeleton for a game, hopefully I'll make it a full game someday. 

I need ideas for the map so if you got any don't be afraid to share it with me, I usually don't bite :-)

btw it's a zip file because otherwise the game is broken, so yeah.
